summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5405 for the improvement of 12th Avenue Southwest, from West Cloverdale Street to West Roxbury Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 67370, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
